verifications.details: All 5 checks passed: enum present, mappings correct, keywords defined, genre profiles added, no syntax errors
No timbila found in enum, synthesis, docs, or genre profiles
M/S encode/decode EXISTS in reverb.py (lines 443-464) but only for width control. NOT exposed as general utility. Missing: M/S EQ, M/S compression, polarity inversion, standalone module
NumPy + SciPy (already installed) provide everything needed. No new dependencies required. Vectorized M/S processing is trivial: mid=(L+R)/2, side=(L-R)/2
Recommended: Create stereo_utils.py, integrate into MixChain, refactor reverb.py to use shared utils, add to master chain before limiter
